title: It's amazing how there are so many people who never read patch notes
body: This isn't exclusive to a certain elo either, this is a large amount of players who literally are just oblivious to game changes. I've had so many plat/diamond players ask why so many Mordes bot lane, was it an LCS game or soemthing??? No, it was literally only on the front page of the client for a month, along with other major changes.
